entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
